items.name: enum Unicode.GeneralCategory
items.desc: The most general classification of a Unicode scalar.

items.name: struct Unicode.CanonicalCombiningClass
items.desc: The classification of a scalar used in the Canonical Ordering Algorithm defined by the Unicode Standard.

items.name: enum Unicode.NumericType
items.desc: The numeric type of a scalar.

items.name: protocol UnicodeCodec
items.desc: A Unicode encoding form that translates between Unicode scalar values and form-specific code units.

items.name: enum UnicodeDecodingResult
items.desc: The result of one Unicode decoding step.

items.name: enum Unicode.ParseResult
items.desc: The result of attempting to parse a T from some input.

items.name: func transcode<Input, InputEncoding, OutputEncoding>(Input, from: InputEncoding.Type, to: OutputEncoding.Type, stoppingOnError: Bool, into: (OutputEncoding.CodeUnit) -> Void) -> Bool
items.desc: Translates the given input from one Unicode encoding to another by calling the given closure.

items.name: typealias Unicode.Version
items.desc: A version of the Unicode Standard represented by its major and minor components.
